James Quentin "Big Jim" Wright (March 19, 1966 na September 29, 2018) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwú, onye na-ede egwu, onye na'ede egwu, ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ

Ónyé otu olu na ngwá ọrụ Sounds of Blackness, Wright ghọrọ onye na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke ndị na-emepụta ihe Jimmy Jam na Terry Lewis na ónyé na-emepụta ụlọ maka ụlọ ọrụ ha, Flyte Tyme Productions, na 1990s.

A mụrụ Wright na Rockford, Illinois. Nwa Jenniel Wright na Alan Jackson, ọ bìrì ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ ya na Rockford, ọ bikwa na Roscoe yana Rancho Cucamonga, California, na Atlanta, Georgia. N'afọ 1984, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Rockford West High School tupu ọ kwaga Eden Prairie, Minnesota.

Na Minnesota, Wright sonyeere ndị na-agụ egwú na ndị na-akpọ Sounds of Blackness, na-eje ozi dị ka ónyé na-emepụta, onye nhazi na ónyé na-ede egwu. Site n'aka ónyé otu Ann Nesby, ọ jikọtara ya na onye na-ede egwu na onye na'emepụta egwu Terry Lewis onye Lewis nyere Wright nkwekọrịta mbipụta pụrụ iche na ụlọ ọrụ ha, Flyte Tyme Production, Mgbè ọ ka na-enye ndị isi olu na mkpịsị aka maka Sounds of Blackness.
N'afọ 1999, o dere ma mepụta egwu Yolanda Adams nke NAACP Image Award "Open My Heart"

N'afọ 2004, Wright meriri Black Reel Award maka Best Original or Adapted Song màkà onyinye ya na "He Still Loves Me" maka ụda nke ihe nkírí egwu egwu The Fighting Temptations (2003). N'afọ 2006, o ritere ihe nrite Grammy màkà egwu Gospel kacha mma màkà ide egwu Adams "Be Blessed" site na abọm ya Day by Day (2006).
Na Septemba 29, 2018, a hụrụ Wright nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya na Rockford.
